Projects

Projects (3)
The Oz Mammals Genomics Initiative
Project
The Oz Mammals Genomics initiative is developing genomic resources for Australias mammals, tackling wildlife genomics at a continental scale. The availability of such resources for marsupials, rodents, and bats will underpin new studies of mammal evolution and guide conservation of the Australian mammal fauna. See: https://ozmammalsgenomics.com/
